flavorText:
"Blades dull and armor dents. Marisi taught us that instinct is the only thing a true warrior needs."
—Ajani

foreignData.flavorText: „Klingen werden stumpf, Rüstungen bekommen Dellen. Marisi hat uns gelehrt, dass echte Krieger nur ihren Instinkt benötigen." —Ajani
foreignData.name: Schonungsloser Nacatl

foreignData.flavorText: "Las hojas se desafilan y las armaduras se mellan. Marisi nos enseñó que el instinto es lo único que un verdadero guerrero necesita." —Ajani
foreignData.name: Nacatl indómito

foreignData.flavorText: « Une lame s'émousse et une armure plie. Marisi nous a enseigné que l'instinct est la seule chose qui soit essentielle à un vrai guerrier. » —Ajani
foreignData.name: Nacatl farouche

foreignData.flavorText: "Le lame si arrugginiscono e le armature si ammaccano. Marisi ci ha insegnato che è l'istinto l'unica cosa di cui ha bisogno un vero guerriero." —Ajani
foreignData.name: Nacatl Selvaggio

foreignData.flavorText: 「刃は鈍り、鎧は傷つく。 マリーシは我々に、真の戦士に必要なのは本能だけだと教えてくれたのだ。」 ――アジャニ
foreignData.name: ナカティルの野人
foreignData.text: プロテクション（アーティファクト）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 猫・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: "Lâminas tolas e armaduras inúteis. Marisi ensinou-nos que a única coisa de que um verdadeiro guerreiro precisa são seus instintos." — Ajani
foreignData.name: Selvagem Nacatl

foreignData.flavorText: «Мечи становятся тупыми, а доспехи непрочными от зазубрин. Маризи научил нас, что настоящему воину нужен лишь инстинкт». — Аджани
foreignData.name: Свирепый Накатлец

foreignData.flavorText: 「刀刃会钝，铠甲会凹。 马力希教导我们，真正的战士只须仰赖直觉。」 ～阿耶尼
foreignData.name: 粗蛮拿卡地

name: Nacatl Savage

rulings.text: “Protection from artifacts” means the following: -- Nacatl Savage can't be blocked by artifact creatures. -- Nacatl Savage can't be equipped. It also can't be enchanted by Auras that have somehow become artifacts in addition to enchantments. -- Nacatl Savage can't be targeted by abilities from artifact sources. -- All damage that would be dealt to Nacatl Savage by artifact sources is prevented.
